-InvalidState-.Description: Default state before initializing and when free in the pool

-SummoningState-.Description: Exists, but not active yet, allocates this from the pool

-OnPathState-.Description: Follows the precalculated path, deals damage on collision

-OffPathState-.Description: Finished the precalculated path and goes straight forward, attaches on collision

-Destroyed-.Description: Got destroyed by flashlight/flashbang/firecracker, causes the projectile to be freed on the pool after a certain amount of time

-Detection-.Description: Value active during Off Path state

CrowProjectileMovementSpeedBase.Description: Amplified by movement speed curve, two curves exist for on and off path

CrowProjectileDestructionLingeringTime.Description: Amount of time the projectile stays visible (doing an animation) when destroyed

CrowProjectileSummoningTime.Description: Amount of time before the crow can be fired after being summoned

CrowProjectileNearSurvivorAudioRange.Description: The range at which SFX will be played for a nearby crow passing a survivor, not to be confused with a near miss which is not related

CrowProjectileIdleTime.Description: Amount of time a crow stays idle before disappearing, extended by placing more crows

MaximumAmmo.Description: Maximum amount of ammo available to place at once

AmmoResetCooldownOnExpire.Description: Cooldown for ammo to reset when the ammo was not fired, but expired instead, flat number that is not multiplied

AmmoResetCooldownOnFiringOneCrow.Description: Cooldown for ammo to reset when one ammo was fired

AmmoResetCooldownOnFiringTwoCrows.Description: Cooldown for ammo to reset when two ammo was fired

AmmoResetCooldownOnFiringThreeCrows.Description: Cooldown for ammo to reset when three ammo was fired

AmmoResetCooldownOnFiringFourCrows.Description: Cooldown for ammo to reset when four ammo was fired

AmmoResetCooldownOnFiringFiveCrows.Description: Cooldown for ammo to reset when five ammo was fired

AmmoResetCooldownOnFiringReduction.Description: Reduction influenced by addons, multiplied by amount of crows fired

CrowSummonInteractionChargeTime.Description: Amount of time to charge the interaction

CrowSummonSpawnDistance.Description: Distance of how far in front of the killer the crow will be summoned

CrowSummonCooldownBetweenSummons.Description: Amount of time between being able to summon more crows while charged

CrowSummonGuideLength.Description: The length of the guide on the floor showing the the direction you are summoning in

CrowSummonGuideWidth.Description: The width of the guide on the floor showing the the direction you are summoning in

CrowPathLength.Description: The length of the precalculated path

CrowSummonSlowdownLingerTime.Description: Should be set to 0 since the cooldown interaction handles this

CrowSummonGracePercentage.Description: How far the killer can charge until cancelling the interaction incurs the cooldown interaction

---CooldownInteraction---.Description: The cooldown that exists after the spawn interaction or fire interaction ends, stops interactions and basic attacks

CooldownInteractionTime.Description: How long the cooldown will take

CrowSpawnRestrictionDistanceFromCrows.Description: How far the crow needs to be from other crows to be spawned

CrowSpawnRestrictionDistanceFromGenerato.Description: How far the crow needs to be from generators to be spawned

CrowSpawnRestrictionDistanceFromActiveHo.Description: How far the crow needs to be from active hooks to be spawned

CrowSpawnRestrictionDistanceFromExitSwit.Description: How far the crow needs to be from exit gates to be spawned

CrowSpawnRestrictionDistanceFromHatch.Description: How far the crow needs to be from the hatch to be spawned

SurvivorRemoveCrowInteractionAuraLingerT.Description: How long it takes for the aura to disappear once the survivor starts the interaction

SurvivorRemoveCrowInteractionChargeTime.Description: How long it takes for the survivor to remove the attached crow

KillerInstinctLingerTime.Description: How long the killer instinct lingers after being scanned

KillerInstinctDelay.Description: How long we wait to activate killer instinct, used as a buffer to see if you end up being hit

KillerInstinctGracePeriod.Description: The grace period for how long we look back for any hits to cancel KI activation

SurvivorInvincibilityTimeFromCrows.Description: How long the survivor is invincible against crows after being hit by one

PathGenerationFloorSearchHeight.Description: After what distance do we give up on finding a floor

PathGenerationOptimizationNumberOfSpline.Description: Amount of spline parts we pool per path

PathGenerationHeight.Description: Default height at which the crow projectile is spawned and from which the path is generated

PathGenerationDistanceChecks.Description: Each time the check fails, the distance will be checked at half of the distance

FlashlightTimeForDestruction.Description: Amount of time it takes for the flashlight to destroy an attached or idle crow

FlashlightablePointsDistanceScale.Description: Scale for the flashlightable points assigned to the crow

FlashlightDisableTime.Description: Time it takes for being flashlighted to be disabled while the value does not increase

HinderOnTouchingIdleCrowLingerTime.Description: Addons modify the value, base can stay 0
